context: However, the sound is identifiable as a fan and therefore the "other characteristics" penalty of 3dB stated in BS4142 will be applied.

Measurements of the proposed kitchen extract system have been undertaken at an existing operational care home by the same developer. These measurements were conducted in the room directly above the extract fan with the window open on standard LNT opening limiters. The sound from the fan was neither measurable nor identifiable within the room above. Consequently, self-noise / structure-borne noise from the unit is not considered to be an issue for the proposed development.
explanation: Inserting required confirmation regarding self-noise measurements.
